item.description:
NOT DOING ANYTHING NEW YEARS DAY!!
TWO Tickets to join Lisa and Diamonds Members Raya to see "Lombardi, a new play by Oscar winner and Steppenwolf Theater Company member Eric Simonson, & co-Staring Dan Lauria (The Wonder Years) and Judith Light(Who's The Boss?)

Where:
Circle in the Square Theatre
W. 50th St. Between Broadway and 8th Ave
New York, NY 10019

When: January 1st, Play is at 2:00 p.m. We are meeting at 1:30 sharp!!


Cost: Tickets are originally $80!! But we getting a hook up for $12

Performance Description:
"Lombardi, a new play by Oscar winner and Steppenwolf Theater Company member Eric Simonson" is based on the best-selling biography When Pride Still Mattered: A Life of Vince Lombardi, by Pulitzer Prize-winning author David Maraniss.
This original work brings the audience into the life and times of one of America's most inspirational and mercurial personalities, Hall of Fame football coach, Vince Lombardi.
It is directed by the Tony-nominated Thomas Kail (In the Heights) and stars Dan Lauria (The Wonder Years) and Judith Light(Who's The Boss?)

"I liked this show a LOT...and I don't even watch football!"
-Scott R., TheaterMania.com


YOU MUST GUARANTEE ATTENDANCE!! BY FRIDAY DEC 31, 2010
item.name: HAPPY NEW YEAR MEMBERS!! TWO $12 TIX To See Theatric Performance: Lombardi
